module.name: System Firewall
module.description: Integrated PBX Firewall. Currently works with RHEL 6 and RHEL 7 compatible distributions. Note: This requires the Sysadmin RPM. Please see wiki for further information.
module.changelog: *16.0.8* FREEI-1659 Changing firewall wizard imaging *16.0.7* FREEPBX-21613 Clicking on save rules button in Firewall - Advanced custom rules page without making any changes gives response in some spanish language. *16.0.6* FREEPBX-21612 - Fix: The log list does not show data. *16.0.5* FREEPBX-21612 *16.0.4* FREEPBX-21609: Add button only save rules. *16.0.3* FREEPBX-21472: Correct layout *16.0.2* FREEPBX-21053, backup and restore custom rules *16.0.1alpha* 16.0.1 alpha release
